member.name: T:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests
member.summary: Class that will test the constructor and ReadLine() method of the FibonacciTextReader class.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineFirstCallTest
member.summary: Tests the first generated Fibonacci number string.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineSecondCallTest
member.summary: Tests to make sure the base case for generating the second fibonacci number works.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineLastCallTest
member.summary: Tests the last generated fibonacci number.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineThirdCallTest
member.summary: Tests the normal case of a fibonacci that is after the second and before the last.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineFirstNullTest
member.summary: Tests to make sure null is returned after reading all fibonacci numbers.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineReoccuringNullTest
member.summary: Tests to make sure null continues to return after calling ReadLine more than the maximum lines + 1.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineZeroMaxLineTest
member.summary: Tests to make sure null is returned when object is initialized with 0.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineNegativeMaxLineTest
member.summary: Tests to make sure null is returned when object is initialized with negative number.

member.name: M:NotepadTests.FibonacciTextReaderTests.ReadLineCutoffValueTest
member.summary: Tests ReadLine when object is intialized with maximum value, would take too long to run so should make a cutoff value.
